name: Robert P. ORMSBEE and Sonny's Sportwear, Inc., Appellants, v. Anna F. SABATINO, Individually and as Administratrix of the Estate of Carmine J. Sabatino and as Custodian for Marietta J. Sabatino, et al., Appellees

judges: Before JONES, C. J., and EAGEN, O’BRIEN, ROBERTS, POMEROY, NIX and MANDERINO, JJ.
parties: Robert P. ORMSBEE and Sonny’s Sportwear, Inc., Appellants, v. Anna F. SABATINO, Individually and as Administratrix of the Estate of Carmine J. Sabatino and as Custodian for Marietta J. Sabatino, et al., Appellees.

opinions.text:
OPINION OF THE COURT
PER CURIAM.
Decree affirmed.
Costs on the appellants.
POMEROY, J., dissents.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

attorneys: F. Paul Laubner, Martin H. Philip, Palmerton, George W. Westervelt, Jr., Stroudsburg, for appellants.
Jackson M. Sigmon, Bethlehem, for appellees.
casebody.head_matter:
353 A.2d 38
Robert P. ORMSBEE and Sonny’s Sportwear, Inc., Appellants, v. Anna F. SABATINO, Individually and as Administratrix of the Estate of Carmine J. Sabatino and as Custodian for Marietta J. Sabatino, et al., Appellees.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Argued June 26, 1975.
Decided March 17, 1976.
F. Paul Laubner, Martin H. Philip, Palmerton, George W. Westervelt, Jr., Stroudsburg, for appellants.
Jackson M. Sigmon, Bethlehem, for appellees.
Before JONES, C. J., and EAGEN, O’BRIEN, ROBERTS, POMEROY, NIX and MANDERINO, JJ.
